notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Charles A. Andersen to J. P. Carlson: Agatite and Hamlin Avenues. Price, $5,500.
Chicago Title & Trust Company to Wilhelm Sorensen: Drake and Chicago Avenues. Price, $2,653.
Julia Olsen to Charlotte Lewis: Troy Street and Schubert Avenue. Price, $10.
Charlotte Lewis to Julia Olsen: Troy Street and Schubert Avenue. Price, $1.
Carl A. Carlson to William Novak: Norton Park Householders Addition, lots 29
Olof T. Olsen to Grace C. Lindstrom: Franklin Park, Fourth Addition, lots 21 and 22, block 11. Price, $1.
B. Amundsen to B. Amundsen Publishing Company: Palos Park, Addition, block 3. Price, $500.
Carl . L. Christensen: Grove Addition, blocks 2 and 4. Price, $9,000.
